Views¶

Holds the views for the cccenter app.

cccenter.views.auth_view(request)¶

Authenticates user or returns error page if authentication fails.

cccenter.views.challengeList(request)¶

Returns challenge list with collumns of id, date, difficulty, and challengetype.

If the user is logged in, returns a list of his private challenges as well as all group challenges. Else returns only a list of all group challenges.

cccenter.views.challenge_page(request)¶

If requested with a GET request, Returns the challenge page associated with the given challenge_id.

If requested with a POST request, Generates an invitation to the submitted user to join the challenge.

cccenter.views.check_plaintext(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Checks if submitted plaintext is the correct answer. If it is, update the challenge as solved by the user and return True. Else return false.

cccenter.views.create_challenge(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

A page used to create a new challenge. If called with a GET request, returns the page. If called with a POST request, creates the challenge. If a difficulty was selected we pick a random cipher based on the difficulty Else we use the selected cipher.

cccenter.views.getCipher(request)¶

Returns a ciphertext as JSON data.

cccenter.views.home(request)¶

Returns the home page.

cccenter.views.join_challenge(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Adds the current user to the requested challenge.

cccenter.views.loggedin(request)¶

Redirects to home page.

cccenter.views.login(request)¶

Returns login page.

cccenter.views.logout(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Logs user out and redirects to the home page.

cccenter.views.notifications(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Returns all notifications for a user.

cccenter.views.profile(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Returns the current user’s profile page.

If the user doesn’t have an associated UserProfile, creates one.

cccenter.views.register(request)¶

If called with a GET request, returns registration page.

If called with a POST request, verifies user registration information. If valid, registers use. Else returns an error.

cccenter.views.settings(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Try getting the user profile, if it does not exists create one.

If called with a GET request, returns settings page.

If called with POST, create settings, user, and password forms. Update all the corresponding tables and return the profile page.

cccenter.views.tutorial(request)¶

Returns the tutorial page.

cccenter.views.update_notifications(request)¶

Updates the notifications based on which has been viewed

cccenter.views.usercomment(request)¶

Adds a comment by updating the database Returns user to the challenge page
